name: Bully Bash
description:
Dip, dodge, and punch in this frantic, arena style beat 'em up. Free your new school from the clutches of your bullies! Using your fists, work your way to the top of the bully food chain by defeating your school's menacing gangs. Only then can you teach the head bullies the error of their ways!

Bash your way through a varied collection of levels, locations, and bullies.

Each location is different from the last, containing a new snippet of story dialogue to enjoy. 

Learn more about your bullies and their motivations (and wallop some pesky henchmen while doing it).

Bully Bash features both hectic, action packed levels...


Intriguing character dialogue...

As well as programmer art to the max!

Enjoy!
